text: Need Sean Roberts for Fantastic Furniture campaign. Budget around $20,898, looking for 2 x TV appearance, 2 x Lifestyle photography, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Press release quote, 2 x Meet and greet. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
